content: the measurements of the dog burst approx 28/32 40/44 48/52 cm / 11/12½ 15/17 19/20½ back length approx 24 32 - 40 cm / 9½ 12½ 15¾ examples of sizes of dogs xs = chihuahau s = bichon frise m = cocker spaniel materials drops karisma from garnstudio 100-100-150 g color no 21 light gray drops circular needle size 4 mm / us 6 40 cm / 16 or the size needed to obtain the correct knitting gauge drops double pointed needle and short circular needle size 3 mm / us 2 or 3
